CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Premium Users relative to Free Users?
SRP.A: Premium Users is {below} Free Users in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Free Users relative to Premium Users?
SRP.A: Free Users is {above} Premium Users in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Desktop Users relative to New Users?
SRP.A: Desktop Users is {below} New Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Desktop Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Free Users}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Premium Users's maximum User Engagement Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Premium Users's maximum User Engagement Rate is in {1966}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Desktop Users's minimum User Engagement Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Desktop Users's minimum User Engagement Rate is in {1970}.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1976, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1969?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between 1967 and 1976 was {larger} than between 1966 and 1969.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1992, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1973 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between 1971 and 1992 was {larger} than between 1973 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1985, was the average total User Engagement Rate higher or lower than between 1980 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total user engagement rate between 1974 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1980 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1989, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between 1981 and 1989 was {larger} than between 1991 and 1993.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Desktop Users} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Premium Users and New Users first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Premium Users and New Users first exchanged leading positions in {1968}.
